basics.name: NIPUN SHARMA
basics.label: Support Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Support Engineer with expertise in back-end development, front-end development, and miscellaneous technologies. Skilled in Java, NodeJS, Python, Express, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Amazon AWS, DynamoDB, Git, MongoDB, Machine Learning, Data Science, and SQL.

work.name: Amazon
work.summary: Led the Certificate Automation project at Amazon, demonstrating proficiency in Node.js, Express, and AWS services. Facilitated cross-functional collaboration and drove innovation in Node.js and Express technologies. Utilized AWS services for data management and version control.
highlights: Utilized AWS services for data management

work.name: TCR Innovation
work.position: Machine Learning and Data Science Intern
work.summary: Identified business problems and recommended data-driven solutions. Conducted exploratory data analysis on various datasets using libraries such as Seaborn, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, and SciPy.

projects.name: Certification Automation
projects.description: Led an initiative to transform a manual process into an automated system using Node.js, Express, AWS CodeCommit, and DynamoDB. Reduced processing time and increased productivity.
highlights: Led initiative to automate manual process

projects.name: House Price Prediction
projects.description: Utilized machine learning algorithms and data analytics tools to predict house prices. Applied data visualizations for accurate forecasting.

certificates.name: Introduction to Industry and Internet of Things
Developing Soft Skill and Personality and Enhancing Soft and Personality
